title: Bug 17177Javadoc wizard doesn't remember checked options between 2 runs
description: Bug 17177Javadoc wizard doesn't remember checked options between 2 runs Build 20020521The Javadoc wizard doesn't remember that I checked 'Open generated index filein browser' between 2 runs.
OB: As a result, I cannot just press Finish, but I needto press Next twice, then check the option again, then press Finish.
